name: A Small Favor - 2D Side-Scrolling Adventure Game
blurb: A 2D, side-scrolling sci-fi adventure game for PC and MAC with focus on story, exploration and puzzle solving... with a laser gun!

rewards.reward:
"A SMALL THANK YOU"
==============================

Our eternal thanks and access to our special "BACKER ONLY" forum on ClickShakeGames.com.

"AN EARLY BIRD FAVOR"\r\n============================== As a THANK YOU for being one of the first to back our project, we're offing a LIMITED amount of digital downloads of the game at the Early Bird price!  You'll also get your name in the credits and exclusive access to our "BACKER ONLY" forum.
"A PLAYABLE FAVOR"\r\n==============================\r\nA digital download of the game and your name in the end credits. As well as exclusive access to our "BACKER ONLY" forum.

"AN EXTRA PLAYABLE FAVOR"
==============================
A digital download of our first commercial adventure game "The Ballads of Reemus" to play while you wait for us to finish this one.
Along with a digital download of the "A Small Favor" soundtrack by Sergiu Muresan and a PDF E-Book of all the concept and production art. 
As well as all previous rewards tiers.

"A NAME ME FAVOR" ============================== \r\nALL DIGITAL REWARD--- Name an NPC character. Those characters milling in the background, going about their daily business. Help them step out of obscurity and bless them with a name of their own. Also includes all previous digital reward tiers. \r\n*Name must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.- THIS REWARD IS STAND ALONE AND IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIER

"A BOXED FAVOR"
==============================
A physical CD copy of the game with full color slipcase in a DVD box. Comes with an autographed and numbered "Certificate of Authenticity". 
As well as all previous reward tiers.

"A SPEAK TO ME FAVOR" ============================== \r\nALL DIGITAL REWARD--- Name an NPC character AND give them a one sentence (140 characters MAX) line of dialogue. The character will say this line anytime the player talks to them. Also includes all previous digital reward tiers.\r\n*Name & Dialogue must be in good taste and not violate any copyrights.- THIS REWARD IS STAND ALONE AND IS NOT INCLUDED IN ANY OTHER REWARD TIER

"A WEARABLE FAVOR"
==============================
A limited edition "A Small Favor" T-shirt.
As well as all previous rewards tiers.

"AN INVENTORY FAVOR"
==============================
Create and name your own inventory item in the game. Your item will be usable for all other players and may even end up in a puzzle solution! 
As well as all previous reward tiers.

*Any player created item, character or quest must be in good taste as determined by ClickShake games and not violate any existing copyrights.

"A CHARACTER FAVOR"
==============================
Become a character in the game! Send us a picture and we'll create a character with your likeness. Give your character a name and we'll find them a place to live. 
As well as all previous reward tiers

*Any player created item, character or quest must be in good taste as determined by ClickShake games and not violate any existing copyrights.

"A PERSONAL FAVOR"
==============================
Create your own favor objective. Will it be Assasination? Identity Theft? Home Invasion? You create a mission and we'll figure out the puzzle details.
As well as all previous reward tiers

*Any player created item, character or quest must be in good taste as determined by ClickShake games and not violate any existing copyrights.

"A STORY OF FAVORS"
==============================
You've created your own item, character and mission. It's time to take on a starring role. We'll create an Easter Egg side quest making your character playable in-game. 
As well as all previous reward tiers

*Any player created item, character or quest must be in good taste as determined by ClickShake games and not violate any existing copyrights.
